item.title: ‘I’m guilty.’ Lutz man charged with making threats to kill teacher, students in Oregon
item.description: He was charged with written or electronic threat to conduct a mass shooting or act of terrorism.

item.title: Sarasota County approves $9.4M Manasota Beach Road bridge improvement project
item.description: Sarasota County officials say construction is expected to be complete by the end of 2028.

item.title: Locals concerned as 1.7 million gallons of wastewater bypassed into Manatee River
item.description: The bypass happened on September 8th and has been causing concern within the community.

item.title: Time is ticking; Wilkinson parents speak out about possible school closure
item.description: The school district is proposing a plan to move Wilkinson students into three other schools.

item.title: Bradenton Man arrested for animal cruelty
item.description: The Bradenton Police Department has arrested Christian Cuello on a charge of animal cruelty after he was caught on camera repeatedly beating a puppy.

item.title: Back-to-back 7-Eleven robberies reported in Venice and North Port, police say
item.description: Investigators believe the two robberies are related.

item.title: US Senate unanimously passes resolution designating National Day of Remembrance for Charlie Kirk
item.description: Sen. Rick Scott called for the passage of the resolution Thursday, highlighting the devastating loss of a friend, husband and father.

item.title: Cause of death determined for man killed on thrill ride at Epic Universe
item.description: A cause of death has been released for a man who died Wednesday after riding a roller coaster at Universal’s Epic Universe theme park in Orlando.
